original_title: No seas pendejo. Un corto complejo.
overview: About people and their complexes and how some believe everyone should have one. Here’s the story of a young man, Juan, who has no complexes, and according to his father, this is why he has no future. Watch what happens as Juan tries to understand the whole 'complex' situation and the conclusions he ends up at.
title: No seas pendejo. Un corto complejo.
